Package brickdestroy.model

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
brickdestroy.model.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class Ball extends Object
An abstract Ball class that is responsible to create the ball face and set the position, speed, colour of the ball.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB, Color inner, Color border)
      A ball constructor that initialises the ball variables.
      Parameters:
      center - center of the ball
      radiusA - diameter of the ball (width of rectangle)
      radiusB - diameter of the ball (height of rectangle)
      inner - inner color of the ball
      border - border color of the ball
